name: BibleVerseoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, start Bible verse”
”Alexa, ask Bible verse for todays verse”
”Alexa, ask Bible verse for one”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible verse
des:
This skill connects to the BibleGateway.com or bible.org daily bible verse feed and has Alexa read it to you. 

You can choose your preferred bible translation (NIV is used by default, or you can select NIVUK, KJV, ASV, NASB, ESV, NLT) with these commands:
 "Ask Bible Verse to use the New International Version"
 "Ask Bible Verse to use the New International Version UK"
 "Ask Bible Verse to use the King James Version"
 "Ask Bible Verse to use the American Standard Version"
 "Ask Bible Verse to use the New American Standard Bible"
 "Ask Bible Verse to use the English Standard Version"
 "Ask Bible Verse to use the New Living Translation"

You can query the current translation by asking
 "Alexa, ask Bible Verse which translation it is"

--------
Technical details and attribution:
 All translations EXCEPT for the NETBible Translation use Scripture translations Powered by BibleGateway.com, using the verse of the day webservice via 
https://www.biblegateway.com/usage/votd/
 The NETBible Translation (https://labs.bible.org). NETBible Scripture is quoted by permission. All scripture quotations, unless otherwise indicated, are taken from the NET Bible® copyright ©1996-2023 by Biblical Studies Press, L.L.C. All rights reserved.
 Icons derived from Creative Commons Image by David Campbell on Flickr https://www.flickr.com/photos/knowhim/337522540
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
